text: Kenneth John "Ken" Thompson (born 1 March 1945) was an English professional footballer who played as a half-back in the Football League for Ipswich Town and Exeter City, and in non-League football for Yeovil Town. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Suffolk Category:Sportspeople from Ipswich Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Ipswich Town F.C. players Category:Exeter City F.C. players Category:Yeovil Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Ken Thompson (footballer, born 1945)
